subject: Testing WebService using Ant,Junit
msgSnippet: Dear All, Can anyone tell me how to test a WebService using ant,junit from Command prompt? The WebService is as follows: public class SampleWs implements
messageBody:
Dear All,

Can anyone tell me how to test a WebService using ant,junit from Command prompt?

The WebService is as follows:

public class SampleWs implements com.bea.jws.WebService
{
static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;

/**
* @common:operation
*/
public String hello()
{
return "V";
}
}

Thanks & Regards,
Ravi Chandra Vemuri
